eventDate.description: The date the outcome of the property purchase was known. This cannot be in the future.

propertyPurchaseResult.description: Whether a property purchase was completed or failed.

propertyPurchaseValue.description: The value of the property that the investor purchased. Only include this information if the purchase was completed. You can include an amount up to 2 decimal places.

originalPurchaseOutcomeId.description: The ID of the purchase outcome affected by the correction.

originalEventDate.description: The eventDate of the purchase outcome affected by the correction.
